author: veithen
msg: Changed POMs so that the legal files (LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt) are added using maven-remote-resources-plugin.
Reason: The Maven Eclipse plugin doesn't support (re)source folders located outside of the module directory. Using maven-remote-resources-plugin solves this issue.

author: snoopdave
msg: Dozen or so Javadoc fixes , see ROL-1810
